alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Local Area Emergency issued June 22 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Expected severe weather in Pueblo County tonight will increase the already present floodwaters and damage from last night`s storm. ... The following message is transmitted at the request of Pueblo County Sheriff`s Office. Severe weather is expected TONIGHT. SEVERE rains and LARGE hail are possible. Flooding exists in portions of eastern Pueblo County; some areas have extensive road damage with road closures in place. Flooding WILL worsen tonight along the Fountain and Arkansas Rivers; more rain will increase flooding in low-lying areas. DO NOT drive through flood waters; TURN AROUND; DON`t DROWN. Pueblo County Sheriff`s Office. TURN AROUND... DON`t DROWN. If you`re in a low-lying or flood-prone area... move to a higher elevation or away from the flood waters. Do not drive through or around road closures. If unable to get to safety... call 9-1-1. Do not walk through flooded areas. &&
